Package com.googlecode.routing.simulator

Class Summary
LinkInfo Represents the information of a link (edge) that is part of the network graph
LinkTable Contains the set of information about the links to other routers that are connected to the one that owns this entity
Main Initializes the environment and execute the router algorithm
PathInfo Contains the information about how to reach another router
Router Represents the Router and calls the actions to communicate and receive messages from other Routers
RouterClient Implements the client side of the router that sends messages to other routers that are directly connected to this one
RouterInfo Metadata about a router
RouterServer Implements the routine of the router that receives messages from the neighbors and update the local information
RouterTable Manages the list of routers available on the network
